p: Another beneficial property of RPLO is its antioxidant activity. Extensive exposure to ultraviolet radiation contributes to premature skin aging [ 54], increasing the risk of carcinogenic processes in this tissue [ 55]. The observed antioxidant activity of RPLO helps to reduce oxidative damage in the skin, particularly the damage responsible for photoaging. Oleic acid has been added to photoprotective and tanning emulsions due to its photoprotective properties, promoting skin regeneration and reducing the damage caused by excessive exposure to sunlight [ 56, 57].
